summary: Email correspondence from Jordy Feldman, Administrator of the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program, reaching out to an NYPD detective to request a conversation about the program. The detective responds by referring the request to FBI Special Agent Young.

persons.name: Jordy Feldman
persons.role: Administrator of the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program
persons.context: Reaches out to an NYPD detective to request a conversation about the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program, which resolves claims of Jeffrey Epstein's victims.

persons.name: Detective
persons.role: NYPD Detective, Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force
persons.context: Receives the request from Jordy Feldman and responds by stating they are not authorized to speak on behalf of the NY FBI, referring the request to FBI Special Agent Young.

persons.name: Special Agent Young
persons.context: Referred to by the NYPD detective as the appropriate contact for Jordy Feldman's request regarding the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program.

persons.name: Elena Vournas
persons.context: Copied on Jordy Feldman's initial email to the NYPD detective regarding the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program request.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the perpetrator whose victims are being compensated through the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program.

connections.description: Jordy Feldman reaches out to the detective to discuss the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program, indicating a professional connection related to victim compensation efforts.
The detective refers Jordy Feldman's request to FBI Special Agent Young, indicating a working relationship or chain of command within law enforcement.
Jordy Feldman administers the compensation program for victims of Jeffrey Epstein, establishing a professional link to Epstein's case.

events.title: Email Request Regarding Epstein Victims' Compensation Program
events.description: Jordy Feldman emails an NYPD detective to request a conversation about the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program, leading to a referral to FBI Special Agent Young.

locations: New York (NYPD Detective Bureau, Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force, N.Y. FBI Squad C20)
keyFacts: Jordy Feldman serves as the Administrator of the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program, a litigation-alternative program to resolve claims of Jeffrey Epstein's victims.
An NYPD detective from the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force is contacted but refers the request to FBI Special Agent Young, indicating inter-agency coordination.
The email correspondence demonstrates ongoing efforts in 2021 to address victim compensation related to the Epstein case.
The detective emphasizes they are not authorized to speak on behalf of the NY FBI, highlighting jurisdictional or procedural boundaries.
The communication underscores the sensitivity and confidentiality of matters related to the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program.
